alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 16 at 12:16AM EST until January 16 at 1:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 145 AM EST. * At 1216 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles west of Crawfordville to 9 miles south of Carrabelle, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point and Hyde Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
